message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a fair offer considering the time pressure and inflation we're facing.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 55/45. This gives you a fair share while still acknowledging the time pressure and your higher inflation rate.
Bob, time is ticking and the value is decreasing.  I'll take $55, you take $45.  This is my final offer.
